title: Cannabis Stocks Are A Coiled Spring - Industry Update With Brady Cobb
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Fantastically timely and edifying episode with industry expert Brady Cobb. We talk recent legislation; moving from optics to real reform. SAFE Banking, uplisting and what legislation will mean for cannabis investors. MSOs, ETFs new and old, future valuations, Florida and NY/NJ markets; selling to Cresco, focus on premium products. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
